content:
§lIntroduction§r

To minimize the number of clicks required to use the app all functions are contextual. To operate the app all actions will require you to Sneak + Right Click with the terminal §lAND§r then open the app. When done correctly the app will not open and the terminal will instantly close after executing the selected function.

§lFunctions§r

- §lCopy§r: To copy an existing machine's configuration, §1Sneak + Right Click§0 the target machine with the terminal and open this app

- §lPaste§r: To paste a previously stored machine configuration, §1Sneak + Right Click§0 the target machine with the terminal and open this app

- §lClear§r: To clear the saved configuration, §1Sneak + Right Click§0 the air and open this app

- §lOpen App§r: To open the app without preforming any functions, simply §1Right Click§0 the air with the terminal and open this app
Before reading this tutorial, please install the Configurator app from the app store.
